articles.description: A photo of the Proxima Centauri that has been making rounds online turned out to be chorizo, a prank from French physicist Etienne Klein.
articles.content:
A French physicist recently trolled his Twitter followers with what seemed to be a photo taken with NASAs James Webb Space Telescope, but is actually chorizo.
Etienne Klein, a research director at t… [+4270 chars]
